Literature.Title: A Head-to-Head Comparison of the Antimicrobial Activities of 30 Ultra-Short Antimicrobial Peptides Against Staphylococcus aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Candida albicans
Literature.Author: Lau QY, Choo XY, Lim ZX, Kong XN, Ng FM, Ang M, Hill J, Chia CS

Literature.Title: Short Synthetic β-Sheet Forming Peptide Amphiphiles as Broad Spectrum Antimicrobials with Antibiofilm and Endotoxin Neutralizing Capabilities.
Literature.Author: Ong ZY, Gao SJ, Yang YY

Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationship studies of ultra-short peptides with potent activities against fluconazole-resistant Candida albicans.
Literature.Author: Ng SMS, et al.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus USA 100(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=6.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=6.25µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=3.9µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29737(MIC=31.3µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=7.8µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 64550 (MIC=12.5µM)
